Tech_Fest_key2: Tech Fest is a refreshing activity for all the students across all the campuses.
Tech_Fest_key3: It will be organized on Saturdays, twice a year where some educational activities will be conducted for enjoyment and for appreciation of those who are doing well in academics.
Tech_Fest_key4: Some games, fun activities will also be there. Best Coaches, Best Mentors and Coder of the Month will also be awarded during the Tech-Fest.
